title: Splash gains in Placements
body:
I was filled sup and we won so I got my LP in sup role (50) and then I looked for my LP in my main role of top lane.

https://imgur.com/rimDoKj

6 seems kind of low to me, I guess I don't really know what I expected, but what do you guys think?
Is 6 enough? Does it increase and I just don't know? Maybe it has something to do with the distance in ranks? (I had no idea what elo I was against till after the game).
